description: Foe escapes like the wind
Grab foes arm. Oops. Try again
You impede foes combat stance. You have the initative.
Foe breaks free if a wear grip. You have Initative next round.
Almost get a grip on foes arm. He avoids his mistake. You gain initiative next round.
Grip to lower back. Foe wards off you attack and prepares for your next move.
Hinder foes weapon arm. Foe vioentliy frees himself and takes a defensive stance.
Youg get in close and grab at foes hair. He is daunted and steps back to escape your reach.
Foe spins away and comes back to face you. He is unbalanced.
Grip to arm gives foe a bruised bicep. Foe shakes free and prepares for your assault.
Strike foes weapon, disarming him. Foe fails to recover weapon. He has put himself in a bad spot.
Passing chest strike. Foe eludes grapple, keeps defensive stance.
Grab an exposed garnment. Uneasy grip impedes foes actions.
Grapple foes shield arm. If hoe has shield, you pull it down. If foe has no schield, you immobilize his arm.
Useful grip on foes neck. Foes face turns red. Hecannot breath easily. Slowly he breaks you grip.
grasp foes leg, lifting it off the ground for a moment. You have the initative for 6 rounds
Entangle foes leg. Foe is knocked down. Foe lands on his weapon arm. He kicks and breaks free.
Ride foe down and immobilze him. He can do nothing for 12 rounds. You are prone also, while holding him down
Foes legs are entrangle long enough to make him fall. He is knocked out for 5 rounds
Your attack falls short
your grip fails.
Foe collides wir your attack before you get a grip. Small bruise.
Grab foe and give him a weak punch. He thinks you are dangerous.
you grip foes shield arm. Foes strike toward your head makes you let go of him. He keeps a distance.
Grip fails, but bash does not. You unbalance your foe. You have the initative.
Pull foe over, he breaks free. His is having touble recovering. Your heart is broken.
Grip foes garnments. They rip and you lose a hopeful hold. Foe is carried back by his break-away.
Foe spins out of your grasp. However, spin nullifies his conterattack.
Slipping grasp arround foes waist is wak. He breaks your grip and stumbles out of your way.
You grab foes wapon arm and make him drop it with  a violent shake. Foe strins wrist trying to break free.
Grip foes neck. Push foes chin back steadily. He should act soon, orâ€¦
Weak hold arround foes waist. He brings his kne up and oyu lose your grip. Foe does nor recover quickly.
Entangle foes shield arm. If foe has shield, your grip makes it impossible to use.  Until shield is dropped: -30 If no shield his arm is entangled
Grip arround foes waist unbalances him. You have the initative. Foe shares much profanity with you
Entangle foes leg and send him down. He does not hit hard. He pulls a muscle in his leg struggling
Pull foes legs together. He goes down, hitting hard and dropping his weapon. He feebly attemps to crawl for it.
Entangle foes arm and flip him to ground, fracturing his leg. You immobilize him completely. He is prone, face down and still concious.
Grip foes neck in a vicious hold.  If foe cannot break your prip in 4 rnds, hhe will begin to pass out from suffocation
fyou fingernails deal a vicious wound
Foe grabs, misses. You have initative.
You cannot get a good grip, foe hrts himself evading. You have initiative.
Foe recovers, continues his defense by sweeping his weapon at your feet
Collide with foe. You push him away  and he stubles back 5 feet. It went better tha you could have hoped.
Your attack is almost comicla as you seek any little grip you can get. All the tiny tugs finally have an effect on foe.
Gran foes waist. Your grip appeared to be strong, but now it is losing its advantage. You foe is working free
Grapple foes leg and try to lift it up off the gound. Foe slips away, but is off balance while recovering.
Short fingers render thigh hild ineffectual. Try lower next time.
Grap foe arround waist. Just when you think you grip is iron, he begins to break free. You might still prevail.
Grab foe, he halls down and you follwo. You knok him prone to stand back up. He is down for 1 round
grab foes shield arm. If foe has shield you grapple it. Until dropped: -50 without shield you grapple his arm.
Very strong griparound foes waist. Foe is held at a great disadvantage. He might ge free.
Entangle foes weapon arm. His weapon is held immobile. He cannot use it, but he will not drop it. He tries to knee you to escape, this fails.
Brutal grip around foes chest, leaves bruises all over him. Your assoulthas created much confusion.
Your assault is stronf and lucky. As you grapple foe, you stomp his foot. He fails hard, breaking his shoulder.
Painfully immobilize weapon arm. Foe cannot surrender quickly enough to aviod damage and pain
Entrangle foes legs, Grapple weapon arm and break it on an available surface. You send foe to the ground. He falls very hard and is knocked out,
Grip foes head and jerk it around. If foe has no neck armor he dies.
A little elbow before you lose your grip.
This was not a special moment
Grab foes head, if foe has a helm, you twist it. Otherwise, you gain initative
Push foe, unbalancing him. You have initiative for 2 rnds.
Hard, but poorly placed. Foe bounces back out of yourgrip. He looks like he does not recognize you
Strike to foes shield arm. If hoe has no shield you immobilie arm for 6 rnds.
Painful grip on foes hand. You do not break anything, but he thinks so. you have the initative for 4 rounds.
Catch foes waist garnments and pull him in. He is in trouble. He seeks to strike you hand and break your hold.
Grip foes side and shake him like a rattle. He is dioriented, but gets free.
Clumsy bear hug around foe. Fo can do little to escape for the moment. Both arms are pinned
Grab leg and flip foe to ground, pinning him. Prone and immobile for 2 rnds, he might surrender.
Foe barely escapes immobilization, but must recover form the ordeal.
You graple for in a brutal way. Hold proves to be excellent. You have him. What next?
Entangle foes weapon arm. Foe hangs onto his weapon, but the arm is immobilized. You try to make him strike himself. It fails.
Grab knee and send foe down. He breaks his fall by breaking his shield arm, he is disarmed and prone.
Tie up both of foes arms. He is immobile and cannot fight back affectively. You have him now
Grapple foes legs and send him over. He hits his head in the fall. You get little resistance after that.
Crushing grip around foes neck. If no neck armor, foe dies in 6 rnds from your mortal grip. Foe is disarmed.
Grapple foes head. His skull is fractured during this assault. If he has no helm he is in coma for 30 days
You grip strand of foes hair. It breaks
You have initiative next round.
Lame attack, but foe is concerned. He moves back.
Stron passing blow near foes head. His violent evasion is not productive.
Uncoordinated attack and a little luck, allows foe to escape your grasp. You have initative for 2 rnds.
attack to upper leg. Foe spins to freak free. He is disoriented badly. It takes a moment for him to see you.
You and fo collide. He breaks your grip and stumbles away. You bounce back and miss a good oportunity.
Grip to shield arm. Foe drops his shield as he wails in pain. You try to stay serious.
Grasp around fes leg proves effective. Foe is unbalanced for a moment.
You find youself on foes shield side. If he has a shield you are stymied
Grasp foe around neck and bring him to ground. Muscles and tendons tear. Foe is prone and immobilized for 3 rnds
You almost disarm foe and trip him. He uses weapon arm to prevent his fall.
Foe evades your grasp by falling to the ground. A clever ploy. Smile at your good fortune.
Grab foes weapon arm and beat on it, without concern foe the rest of foe. Foe is disarmed. Your tear ligaments and pull muscles.
Entangle both of foes arms and pun them to his body. Foe cannot move his arms and he looks ready to surrender.
Foe stumbles, with your assistance, and falls. His weapon breaks on impact.. if has no chest armor he takes a D Krush
Wrap up foes legs. Foe tumbles to the ground like a ragdoll breaking both arms and an ankle. Foe is knocked out
Attack results in strangling hold. Foe Flails legs in desperation. Foe is unable to break free and dies  after 9 rnds of helpless struggling. Grim
Crush foes windpipe and pull the head from his body. You are mighty
